gen:ReportedAttribute.com:Text: Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.

Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
13.1.1 Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
The National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Sustainable Development and Environment Statistics Department)
N.K. Kerimalieva
Sdg_nsc@stat.kg
The indicator reflects deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters

The disaster loss data on mortality is significantly influenced by large-scale catastrophic events, which represents important outliers in terms of mortality, as they normally imply considerable numbers of people killed.
